Move.Name: Steamroller
Move.Effect: Steamroller Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check. If the target is Small, Steamroller deals an additional 1d10.

Move.Name: String Shot
Move.Effect: String Shot creates a Column 2-meters wide. All Legal Targets within the Column lower their Speed 1 Combat Stage. If a target is hit by String Shot 5 times within 5 rounds of combat, they are Trapped. If a target's Speed Combat Stage has already been lowered 6 times, String Shot Traps them.

Move.Name: Spider Web
Move.Effect: Spider Web cannot miss.

Move.Name: Signal Beam
Move.Effect: Signal Beam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Signal Beam confuses the target and any Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Silver Wind
Move.Effect: Silver Wind creates a Column that is 2-meters wide. If you rolled 11-20 during Accuracy Check for Silver Wind, the user has each of its stats raised 1 Combat Stage. If you rolled 16-20 on the Accuracy Roll, all allies in the Column also have each of their stats raised 1 Combat Stage and are not damaged by Silver Wind.

Move.Name: U-Turn
Move.Effect: If U-Turn successfully hits its target, the user deals damage and then immediately is returned to its Poke Ball in the same turn. A New Pokemon may immediately be sent out.

Move.Name: Twineedle
Move.Effect: Twineedle can hit up to 2 times. If Twineedle misses its first target, you may still use it a second time. If you rolled an 18-20 on either Accuracy Check, the target is Poisoned.

Move.Name: Struggle Bug
Move.Effect: Struggle Bug creates a Column 1 meter wide. Struggle Bug lowers all Legal Targets Special Attack 1 Combat Stage on 14-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Tail Glow
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Special Attack 3 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Rage Powder
Move.Effect: Rage Powder creates a Column 1 meter wide. All legal targets may only target the user when using a Move until the user is knocked out or switched out. This Effect lasts for one round of combat.

Move.Name: Defend Order
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Fury Cutter
Move.Effect: If Fury Cutter is used successfully and consecutively on the same target, use 1d8+3 on the second hit instead, 2d10+6 on the third hit instead, 3d10+12 on the fourth hit instead and 4d10+20 on the fifth hit and any successful hits following the fifth hit instead.

Move.Name: Bug Buzz
Move.Effect: Bug Buzz creates a 3-meter Burst. Bug Buzz lowers the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Attack Order
Move.Effect: Attack Order is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Bug Bite
Move.Effect: If the target has a consumable Held Item, Bug Bite destroys the Item and Bug Bite's user may use the Itemâ€™s effect.

Move.Name: Pin Missile
Move.Effect: Pin Missile can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Pin Missile attack on that turn. When adding stats, only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Quiver Dance
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage, raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Megahorn
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 3-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Heal Order
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP.

Move.Name: Leech Life
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Punishment
Move.Effect: Punishment deals an additional 1d10 for each Combat Stage the target has above 0 per raised stat.

Move.Name: Pursuit
Move.Effect: If the foe is fleeing or being switched out, Pursuit may be used as an Interrupt. While being used as an Interrupt, Pursuit may shift the user adjacent to the fleeing foe, up to 25 meters, ignoring Speed Capabilities, and attack them before they escape or are switched out with an additional 2d20+10 added to the Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Quash
Move.Effect: Quash will not affect a Legal Target if it has already acted that round. Quash causes the target to act as if their Speed is 0, meaning their action is last for that turn.

Move.Name: Payback
Move.Effect: If the target damaged Payback's user on their last turn, deal an additional 2d12 for Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Nasty Plot
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Night Daze
Move.Effect: The Target must roll +1 during Accuracy Checks for the remainder of the encounter on 13-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Night Slash
Move.Effect: Night Slash is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Taunt
Move.Effect: Taunt's target can only use Moves that have Damage Dice Rolls for the next 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Thief
Move.Effect: Thief takes the target's held item and attaches it to Thief's user, if the user is not holding anything.

Move.Name: Torment
Move.Effect: For 1d4+2 turns, Torment's target may not use a Move they have already used in their last 2 turns.

Move.Name: Switcheroo
Move.Effect: The user and the target exchange held items.

Move.Name: Snarl
Move.Effect: Snarl creates a 5-meter Burst. All Legal Targets have their Special Attack lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Snatch
Move.Effect: If the target is gaining a Combat Stage, you may use Snatch. The user gains the same Combat Stages the target does. Then, the target loses all Combat Stages they gained that turn.

Move.Name: Sucker Punch
Move.Effect: If something is targeting the user with a damaging Attack - Melee Move, you may use Sucker Punch on the offender as an Interrupt.

Move.Name: Memento
Move.Effect: The user's HP is set to 0. The user does not need a line of sight to the target. Momento cannot be used if the user is at or below 0 HP. Each of the target's stats are lowered 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Dark Pulse
Move.Effect: Dark Pulse creates a 3-meter Burst. Dark Pulse Flinches all Legal Targets on 17- 20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Dark Void
Move.Effect: Dark Void creates a 10-meter Burst. All Legal Targets fall Asleep.

Move.Name: Embargo
Move.Effect: If the target has a held item, they cannot use it for the remainder of the encounter.

Move.Name: Crunch
Move.Effect: Crunch lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Assurance
Move.Effect: If Assurance's target has already been damaged by a Move on the same round Assurance is being used, use 5d8+10 for Assurance's Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Beat Up
Move.Effect: Beat Up can hit up to X times. X is the amount of pokemon on the user's roster including the user. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Beat Up attack on that turn. For each target, use a different pokemon's Attack stat from your roster to calculate damage.

Move.Name: Bite
Move.Effect: Bite Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Foul Play
Move.Effect: The target reveals its Attack stat. When calculating damage, add the target's Attack stat instead of the user's Attack stat.

Move.Name: Hone Claws
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage. For the remainder of Combat, the user's Attack - Melee Moves need -1 on Accuracy Checks to hit.

Move.Name: Knock Off
Move.Effect: If the target has a held item, the target drops it and the item cannot be picked up or held for the remainder of combat.

Move.Name: Fling
Move.Effect: The user may throw its held item when using Fling, changing its Damage Dice Roll. If a berry is thrown, the target receives the berry's benefits as if the target, instead of taking any damage, consumed the berry. If an item that causes an effect is thrown, the item's effect is activated. If any other item is thrown the user deals an additional 2d6 during Damage Dice Roll. All berries or other cosumable held items are destroyed when used with Fling. Items that are not destroyed by Fling may be retrieved after an encounter.

Move.Name: Faint Attack
Move.Effect: Faint Attack cannot miss.

Move.Name: Fake Tears
Move.Effect: Lower the target's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Flatter
Move.Effect: Flatter Confuses the target and raises the target's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Outrage
Move.Effect: Outrage's user must make another Melee attack for 1d2 more turns. The attack is identical to Outrage except for Outrage's effect. After the first target is declared, Outrage targets the nearest Legal Target for its second or third round of use if the original target is unconscious. If potential targets are an equal distance from the user, you may choose the target. After Outrage's additional use(s) end(s), the user becomes Confused. For Pokemon users, the additional 1d2 are their Trainer's Command Actions, unless the Trainer is unconscious, in which case the Pokemon acts on its own until finished.

Move.Name: Dual Chop
Move.Effect: Dual Chop can hit up to 2 times. If Dual Chop misses its first target, you may still use it a second time.

Move.Name: Dragonbreath
Move.Effect: Dragonbreath creates a Column 1 meter wide. Dragonbreath Paralyzes all Legal Targets on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Twister
Move.Effect: Twister Flinches the target on 18-20 during Accuracy Check. If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Twister can hit them, ignoring Range and deals 2d12+16 for its Damage Dice Roll instead.

Move.Name: Spacial Rend
Move.Effect: Spacial Rend is a Critical Hit on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Roar of Time
Move.Effect: Roar of Time creates a 10-meter Burst. All legal targets are Trapped until they roll a 16-20 saving throw. They may attempt to make this save at any time once per round.

Move.Name: Dragon Tail
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 40-meters expelling them from the encounter if the terrain allows. They may still rejoin the encounter if they want to. During a trainer battle, the target's owner must recall the Pushed target and replace them.

Move.Name: Dragon Dance
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Draco Meteor
Move.Effect: Draco Meteor creates a 4-meter Blast. Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

Move.Name: Dragon Rush
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 3-meters and it takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. Dragon Rush Flinches the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Dragon Rage
Move.Effect: Dragon Rage always deals 35 points of Damage. Do not apply weakness or resistance. Do not apply stats.

Move.Name: Dragon Pulse
Move.Effect: Dragon Pulse creates a 3-meter Burst.

Move.Name: Thunderbolt
Move.Effect: Thunderbolt creates a Column 1 meter wide. Thunderbolt Paralyzes all Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Thunderpunch
Move.Effect: Thunderpunch Paralyzes the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Thunder Wave
Move.Effect: Thunder Wave cannot miss. Thunder Wave Paralyzes the target.

Move.Name: Thunder
Move.Effect: A 3-meter Blast surrounds the target. Thunder Paralyzes all Legal Targets on 13-20 during Accuracy Check. All Legal Targets within the Blast's radius are Pushed outward, away from the target, 3-meters. If it is Sunny, Thunder's Accuracy Check is 11. If it is Rainy, Thunder cannot miss. If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Thunder cannot miss them

Move.Name: Thunder Fang
Move.Effect: Thunder Fang Paralyzes or Flinches on 18-19 during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe gets Paralyzed or Flinches. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is Paralyzed and Flinches.

Move.Name: Wild Charge
Move.Effect: After Wild Charge deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Zap Cannon
Move.Effect: A 2-meter Blast surrounds the target, Paralyzing all Legal Targets in the Blast.

Move.Name: Volt Tackle
Move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. Volt Tackle Paralyzes the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check. After Volt Tackle deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Thundershock
Move.Effect: Thundershock Paralyzes the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Volt Switch
Move.Effect: If Volt Switch successfully hits its target, the user deals damage and then immediately is returned to its Poke Ball in the same turn. A New Pokemon may immediately be sent out.

Move.Name: Discharge
Move.Effect: Discharge creates a 3-meter Burst. Discharge Paralyzes all legal targets on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Electro Ball
Move.Effect: The target reveals their current Speed stat, applying Combat Stages. If the user's Speed stat, applying Combat Stages is four times that of the target's, Electro Ball uses 5d10+16 for Damage Dice Roll; if the user three times that of the target's, Electro Ball uses 3d10+14; if the user is twice that of the target, Electro Ball uses 2d10+12; if the user is not twice as fast as the target, Electro Ball uses 1d10+10.

Move.Name: Charge Beam
Move.Effect: Charge Beam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Charge Beam raises the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Bolt Strike
Move.Effect: Bolt Strike Paralyzes the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Charge
Move.Effect: If the user performs an Electric Move on their next turn that deals damage, add its Damage Dice Roll an extra time to the damage. Raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Shock Wave
Move.Effect: Shock Wave creates a Column 2-meters wide. Shock Wave cannot miss.

Move.Name: Spark
Move.Effect: Spark Paralyzes the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Magnet Rise
Move.Effect: Magnet Rise grants the user the Levitate Ability until the end of the Encounter. This does not replace the user's normal Ability. If the user already has Levitate, they now have two instances of Levitate.

Move.Name: Electroweb
Move.Effect: Electroweb creates a Column 2-meters wide. All Legal Targets are lowered 1 Speed Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Fusion Bolt
Move.Effect: Fusion Bolt creates a 4-meter Column. If an opponent in this, or the last, round of the encounter used Fusion Flare, Fusion Bolt deals an additional 5d12 in Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Rock Smash
Move.Effect: Rock Smash lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Reversal
Move.Effect: If the user has more than 70% of its total HP, use 1d10+5 for Damage Dice Roll. If the user has more than 36% of its total HP, use 2d10+10. If the user has more than 21% of its total HP, use 3d10+10. If the user has more than 6% of its total HP, use 4d10+10. If the user has 1-5% of its total HP, use 5d10+20.

Move.Name: Sacred Sword
Move.Effect: Sacred Sword's Accuracy Check may not be modified.

Move.Name: Rolling Kick
Move.Effect: Rolling Kick Flinches the target on 15- 20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Revenge
Move.Effect: If the target damaged Revenge's user on their last turn, deal an additional 4d10 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Low Sweep
Move.Effect: Lowers the target's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Low Kick
Move.Effect: If the target is in Weight Class 1, use 1d10 for Damage Dice Roll. If the target is in Weight Class 2, use 1d10+5. If the target is in Weight Class 3, use 1d10+10. If the target is in Weight Class 4, use 2d10+12. If the target is in Weight Class 5, use 3d10+14. If the target is in Weight Class 6, use 5d10+16 for damage.

Move.Name: Quick Guard
Move.Effect: Quick Guard prevents the user and allies from being targeted by Moves used as an Interrupt or Intercept for one round. For that round Interrupt or Intercept attacks can only target you, or other allies using Quick Guard.

Move.Name: Mach Punch
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Mach Punch on their turn before they can use their Move.

Move.Name: Secret Sword
Move.Effect: When calculating damage, the target must use their Defense against Secret Sword.

Move.Name: Vacuum Wave
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Vacuum Wave on their turn before they can use their Move.

Move.Name: Triple Kick
Move.Effect: Triple Kick can hit up to 3 times. If Triple Kick misses its first or second target, you may still use it a second and third time. For the third use of Triple Kick, if you successfully hit the same target for the first two uses of Triple Kick use 2d20+5 for Triple Kick's Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Wake-Up Slap
Move.Effect: If the target is Asleep, Wake-Up Slap does an additional 5d10 for Damage Dice Roll and cures the target of Sleep.

Move.Name: Vital Throw
Move.Effect: Vital Throw may only be used if the user was targeted by a Move on a foe's last turn while the foe was adjacent. Vital Throw can only target that foe. Vital Throw cannot miss. The target is Pushed 5-meters and it takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Superpower
Move.Effect: Superpower raises the user's Attack 2 Combat Stages, Superpower lowers all of the user's other stats 1 Combat Stage. The target is Pushed 6-meters and it takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Sky Uppercut
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 2-meters. If the target is airborne, Sky Uppercut deals an additional 2d10. If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Sky Uppercut cannot miss as long as you are in a space adjacent to the airborne target.

Move.Name: Seismic Toss
Move.Effect: The target loses HP equal to the level of Seismic Toss' user. Do not apply weakness or resistance. Do not apply stats.

Move.Name: Submission
Move.Effect: After Submission deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Storm Throw
Move.Effect: Storm Throw is a Critical Hit.

Move.Name: Karate Chop
Move.Effect: Karate Chop is a Critical Hit on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Counter
Move.Effect: If the user is being hit by a Move that consults Attack for damage, you may use Counter. If the user survives the hit, the target is dealt damage equal to twice the amount of damage the user received. Do not apply weakness, resistance or immunity. Do not apply stats.

Move.Name: Close Combat
Move.Effect: The user's Defense is lowered 1 Combat Stage and the user's Special Defense is lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Detect
Move.Effect: If the user is hit by a Move, instead you are not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects.

Move.Name: Cross Chop
Move.Effect: Cross Chop is a Critical Hit on 16-20 during Accuracy Check. Cross Chop Pushes the target 1-meter. On Critical Hit, the target is Pushed 5-meters and the target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Circle Throw
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 40-meters expelling them from the encounter if the terrain allows. They may still rejoin the encounter if they want to. During a trainer battle, the target's owner must recall the Pushed target and replace them.

Move.Name: Aura Sphere
Move.Effect: Aura Sphere cannot miss.

Move.Name: Arm Thrust
Move.Effect: Arm Thrust can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Arm Thrust attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Bulk Up
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Brick Break
Move.Effect: Brick Break can destroy Walls.

Move.Name: Double Kick
Move.Effect: Double Kick can hit up to 2 times. If Double Kick misses its first target, you may still use it a second time.

Move.Name: Hammer Arm
Move.Effect: The user lowers their Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Force Palm
Move.Effect: Force Palm Paralyzes the target on 18- 20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Jump Kick
Move.Effect: If Jump Kick misses, roll 2d10 and subtract the result from the user's HP. Do not apply weakness, resistance or stats.

Move.Name: Hi Jump Kick
Move.Effect: If Hi Jump Kick misses, roll 4d10 and subtract the result from the user's HP. Do not apply weakness, resistance or stats.

Move.Name: Focus Punch
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Focus Punch the user's turn ends. If you are not hit by a damaging Move until your next turn you may use Focus Punch's damage and effects. The target is Pushed 10-meters and it takes an additional 2d12 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d12. If the user is hit by a damaging Move before it's next turn, it may not use a Move on that turn.

Move.Name: Dynamicpunch
Move.Effect: Dynamicpunch Confuses the target.

Move.Name: Drain Punch
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Focus Blast
Move.Effect: Focus Blast lower the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Final Gambit
Move.Effect: Final Gambit lowers the user to 0 HP, and deals 1 point of damage to the foe for every point of health lost this way. Final Gambit does not cause items to activate.

Move.Name: Incinerate
Move.Effect: If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry is destroyed, without its ability activating.

Move.Name: Inferno
Move.Effect: Inferno creates a 2-meter Blast. Inferno Burns all Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Lava Plume
Move.Effect: Lava Plume Burns the target on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Heat Wave
Move.Effect: Heat Wave creates a 3-meter burst. Heat Wave Burns all Legal Targets on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Flare Blitz
Move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. Flare Blitz Burns the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check. After Flare Blitz deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Fusion Flare
Move.Effect: Fusion Flare creates a 4-meter Column. If an opponent in this, or the last, round of the encounter used Fusion Bolt, Fusion Flare deals an additional 5d12 in Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Heat Crash
Move.Effect: If the user is in the same Weight Class as the target, use 1d10 for Damage Dice Roll; if the user is one Weight Class higher than the target, use 1d10+10; if the user is two Weight Classes higher than the target, use 2d12+12; if three classes, 3d10+14; if four classes, 5d10+16.

Move.Name: Sunny Day
Move.Effect: For 2 minutes (12 rounds), the area is considered Sunny. While Sunny, Fire- Type attacks deal 1.5x damage. Water- Type attacks deal 1/2 the damage they normally would.

Move.Name: V-Create
Move.Effect: V-Create creates a 10-meter Burst. Lower the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage, lower the user' Special Defense 1 Combat Stage and lower the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Move.Effect: The target is Burned.

Move.Name: Searing Shot
Move.Effect: Searing Shot Burns the Target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Magma Storm
Move.Effect: Magma Storm Traps the target for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 2d20 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Magma Storm may not trap more then one target at a time.

Move.Name: Overheat
Move.Effect: Overheat creates a 2-meter Burst. Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

Move.Name: Sacred Fire
Move.Effect: Sacred Fire creates a 7-meter Burst. Sacred Fire Burns all Legal Targets in the Burst on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Flamethrower
Move.Effect: Flamethrower creates a Column 1 meter wide. Flamethrower Burns the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Eruption
Move.Effect: Eruption creates a 10-meter Burst. Eruption may not be performed unless the user is at full HP.

Move.Name: Fiery Dance
Move.Effect: Fiery Dance raises the user's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on 11-20 on Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Fire Blast
Move.Effect: Fire Blast creates a 2-meter Blast. Fire Blast burns all Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ember
Move.Effect: Ember Burns the target on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Blast Burn
Move.Effect: Blast Burn creates a 3-meter Blast. On Miss, Blast Burn deals the user's Special Attack instead to all possible targets.

Move.Name: Blaze Kick
Move.Effect: Blaze Kick Pushes the target 2-meters. Blaze Kick Burns the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check. Blaze Kick is a Critical Hit on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Blue Flare
Move.Effect: Blue Flare Burns the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Flame Burst
Move.Effect: Flame Burst creates a 4-meter Blast. All Legal Targets, not including the central taget, hit in the Blast lose 1/16th of their max HP instead of taking the Damage Dice Roll for damage.

Move.Name: Flame Charge
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Flame Wheel
Move.Effect: Flame Wheel Burns the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Fire Spin
Move.Effect: Fire Spin Traps the target for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d20 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Fire Spin may not trap more then one target at a time.

Move.Name: Fire Fang
Move.Effect: Fire Fang Burns or Flinches on 18-19 during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe gets Burned or Flinches. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is Burned and Flinches.

Move.Name: Fire Pledge
Move.Effect: If used on the same turn as Water Pledge, all secondary effects of Moves are activated at a -3 during the Accuracy Check for 1d4+1 turns. If used on the same turn as Grass Pledge, all foes within 20 meters of the user lose 1/8th of their max HP at the end of each round of combat for 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Fire Punch
Move.Effect: Fire Punch Burns the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Mirror Move
Move.Effect: Use the Move the target has used on their last turn. You may choose new targets for the Move. Mirror Move cannot miss.

Move.Name: Hurricane
Move.Effect: Hurricane creates a 4-meter Blast. Hurricane Confuses all Legal Targets on 13-20 during Accuracy Check. All Legal Targets within the Blast's radius are Pushed outward, away from the target, 3-meters. If it is Sunny, Hurricane's Accuracy Check is 11. If it is Rainy, Hurricane cannot miss. If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Hurricane cannot miss them.

Move.Name: Fly
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Fly, the user is shifted 25-meters into the air and then the user's turn ends. On your next turn, shift while in the air, lower the user back to the target's level on the battlefield, then use Fly's damage.

Move.Name: Gust
Move.Effect: If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Gust can hit them, ignoring Range and deals 2d12+16 for its Damage Dice Roll instead.

Move.Name: Pluck
Move.Effect: If the target is holding a Berry, Pluck deals an additional 2d10 during Damage Dice Roll and Pluck destroys the Berry then Pluck's user uses the Berryâ€™s effect.

Move.Name: Tailwind
Move.Effect: Tailwind creates a Column 5-meters wide. For 1d6+1 turns, Tailwind's user and all of the user's allies in the Column have their Speed raised 1 Combat Stage. When the user or the user's allies leave the Column or when the Column dissapears, their Speed is lowered 1 Combat Stage. Whenever you make a new Tailwind Cloumn, the last one the user made disappears.

Move.Name: Sky Drop
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Sky Drop, the user and target are moved 25-meters into the air, the Target is Trapped and then the user's turn ends. On your next turn, shift while in the air, lower both the user and the target's heights back to the ground, then use Sky Drop's damage and the target is no longer Trapped. This move does not damage Flying type pokemon.

Move.Name: Roost
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP. The user looses any resistances or immunities to Ground-type Moves until the end of their next turn.

Move.Name: Sky Attack
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Sky Attack, the user is moved 10-meters into the air and then the user's turn ends. On your next turn, shift while in the air, lower your height back to the target and then use Sky Attack's damage. Sky Attack Flinches the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Air Cutter
Move.Effect: Air Cutter is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Air Slash
Move.Effect: Air Slash Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Aeroblast
Move.Effect: Aeroblast creates a Column 2-meters wide. Aeroblast is a Critical Hit on 11- 20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Acrobatics
Move.Effect: If the user is not holding an item, Acrobatics deals an additional 4d10 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Aerial Ace
Move.Effect: Aerial Ace cannot miss.

Move.Name: Bounce
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Bounce, the user is moved up to 10-meters into the air and then the user's turn ends. On your next turn, shift while in the air, lower your height back to the ground, and then use Bounce's damage and the rest of its Effect. Bounce creates a Burst equal half the user's Weight Class. Bounce Paralyzes all Legal Targets on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Featherdance
Move.Effect: Feather Dance creates a 1-meter Blast. All Legal Targets in the Blast have their Attack lowered 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Defog
Move.Effect: For 1 mintue (6 rounds), the area is considered Clear. While Clear, all hindering terrain is no longer hindering terrain and all bonuses or penalties to Accuracy Checks are ignored. All Walls, Coats and Hazards are destroyed.

Move.Name: Brave Bird
Move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. After Brave Bird deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Chatter
Move.Effect: Chatter creates a Column 1 meter wide. Chatter Confuses all Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Shadow Claw
Move.Effect: Shadow Claw is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Shadow Ball
Move.Effect: Shadow Ball lowers the foe's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ominous Wind
Move.Effect: Ominous Wind creates a Column that is 2-meters wide. If you rolled 11-20 during Accuracy Check for Ominous Wind, the user has each of its stats raised 1 Combat Stage. If you rolled 16-20 on the Accuracy Roll, all allies in the Column also have each of their stats raised 1 Combat Stage and are not damaged by Ominous Wind.

Move.Name: Shadow Force
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Shadow Force, the user is removed from the field and the user's turn ends. On the next turn, Shadow Force's user appears adjacent to any target, ignoring Speed Capabilties, and then uses Shadow Force's damage.

Move.Name: Spite
Move.Effect: Spite lowers the target's last moveâ€™s Frequency for the remainder of the encounter. EOT Frequency Moves are changed into Battle Frequency. At-Will Frequency Moves are changed into EOT Frequency. Spite may not target the same target's Move more then once per encounter.

Move.Name: Shadow Sneak
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Shadow Sneak on their turn before they can use their Move.

Move.Name: Shadow Punch
Move.Effect: Shadow Punch cannot miss.

Move.Name: Nightmare
Move.Effect: Nightmare can only hit Legal Targets that are Asleep. Nightmare gives a special affliction, Bad Sleep. Bad Sleep makes a target lose 1/4 of its full HP per turn while it is Bad Sleeping. When the target wakes up, they are cured of Bad Sleep.

Move.Name: Destiny Bond
Move.Effect: When the user faints after taking damage from a Move, you may use Destiny Bond as an Intercept to target the Pokemon who lowered the user to 0 HP or less. Roll 1d20, on a roll of 6 or better the target is set to 0 HP.

Move.Name: Confuse Ray
Move.Effect: Confuse Ray creates a Column 1 meter wide. Confuse Ray cannot miss. All targets are Confused.

Move.Name: Astonish
Move.Effect: Astonish Flinches the target on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Grudge
Move.Effect: When the user faints, you may use Grudge as an Intercept. The Move that caused the user to drop to 0 HP or less has its Frequency changed to Center for 1 hour.

Move.Name: Night Shade
Move.Effect: The target loses HP equal to the level of Night Shade's user. Do not apply weakness or resistance. Do not apply stats.

Move.Name: Lick
Move.Effect: Lick Paralyzes the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Hex
Move.Effect: If the target has a status affliction, Hex deals and additional 4d8 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Razor Leaf
Move.Effect: Razor Leaf is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Seed Flare
Move.Effect: Seed Flare creates a 3-meter Blast. All Legal Targets have their Special Defense lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Seed Bomb
Move.Effect: Seed Bomb creates a 2-meter Blast.

Move.Name: Mega Drain
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Magical Leaf
Move.Effect: Magical Leaf cannot miss.

Move.Name: Petal Dance
Move.Effect: Petal Dance's user must make another Ranged attack for 1d2 more turns. The attack is identical to Petal Dance except for Petal Dance's effect. Petal Dance creates a 3-meter Burst, but only on the first round of its use. After the first use is declared, Petal Dance targets the nearest Legal Target for its second or third round of use if the original target is unconscious. If potential targets are an equal distance from the user, you may choose the target. After Petal Dance's additional use(s) end(s), the user becomes Confused. For Pokemon users, the additional 1d2 are their Trainer's Command Actions, unless the Trainer is unconscious, in which case the Pokemon acts on its own until finished.

Move.Name: Needle Arm
Move.Effect: Needle Arm Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Synthesis
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2/3 of its full HP. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming or Hailing the user gains 1/4 of their full HP.

Move.Name: Worry Seed
Move.Effect: The target's Ability is replaced with Insomnia. If the target has multiple Abilities, Worry Seed only replaces one.

Move.Name: Wood Hammer
Move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. After Wood Hammer deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Solarbeam
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Solarbeam, the user's turn ends. On its next turn, the user may shift and use Solarbeam's damage. If it is Sunny, Solarbeam uses its damage on the turn you declare its use. If it is Rainy or Sand Storming Solarbeam's user must end their turn immediately at the start of their second turn after declaring Solarbeam's use, only getting to use Solarbeam's damage on the third turn. If it is Hailing, Solarbeam's damage is 3d10. Solarbeam creates a Column 1 meter wide.

Move.Name: Sleep Powder
Move.Effect: Sleep Powder creates a 1-meter Blast. All Legal Targets fall Asleep.

Move.Name: Stun Spore
Move.Effect: Stun Spore creates a 1-meter Blast. Stun Spore paralyzes al Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Spore
Move.Effect: The target falls Asleep.

Move.Name: Leech Seed
Move.Effect: At the beginning of each of the target's turns, Leech Seed's target loses 1/8th of their full HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Leech Seed's user then gains HP equal to the amount the target lost. Leech Seed lasts until the target faints or is returned to a Poke Ball. Leech Seed cannot hit a Grass type Pokemon.

Move.Name: Energy Ball
Move.Effect: Energy Ball lowers the foe's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Cotton Spore
Move.Effect: Cotton Spore creates a 2-meter Blast. All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Giga Drain
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Frenzy Plant
Move.Effect: Frenzy Plant creates a 3-meter Blast. On Miss, Frenzy Plant deals the user's Special Attack instead to all possible targets.

Move.Name: Aromatherapy
Move.Effect: The target has 1 status effect of their choice removed. Aromatherapy cannot miss.

Move.Name: Absorb
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Cotton Guard
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Defense 3 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Bullet Seed
Move.Effect: Bullet Seed can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Bullet Seed attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Leaf Blade
Move.Effect: Leaf Blade is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ingrain
Move.Effect: Ingrain is a Coat with the following abilities

Move.Name: Leaf Tornado
Move.Effect: Leaf Tornado creates a 2-meter Burst. On 15-20 during Accuracy Check, all Legal Targets must roll 1 higher on Accuracy Checks for the remainder of the combat.

Move.Name: Leaf Storm
Move.Effect: Leaf Storm creates a 2-meter Column. Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

Move.Name: Grass Pledge
Move.Effect: If used on the same turn as Water Pledge, all foes are treated as if at -2 Speed Combat Stages for 1d4+1 turns, if any foe has additional Speed Combat Stages, apply them as usual. If used on the same turn as Fire Pledge, all foes within 20 meters of the user lose 1/8th of their max HP at the end of each round of combat for 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Grass Knot
Move.Effect: If the target is in Weight Class 1, use 1d10 for Damage Dice Roll. If the target is in Weight Class 2, use 1d10+5. If the target is in Weight Class 3, use 1d10+10. If the target is in Weight Class 4, use 2d10+12. If the target is in Weight Class 5, use 3d10+14. If the target is in Weight Class 6, use 5d10+16 for damage.

Move.Name: Horn Leech
Move.Effect: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

Move.Name: Grasswhistle
Move.Effect: Grasswhistle creates a 5-meter Burst. All Legal Targets fall Asleep.

Move.Name: Mud Shot
Move.Effect: Mud Shot creates a Column 1 meter wide. All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Mud Sport
Move.Effect: Mud Sport makes a Coat that resists Self.

Move.Name: Magnitude
Move.Effect: Magnitude creates a 2-meter Burst. Roll 1d6. On a result of 1, use 1d4 for damage. On a result of 2, use 1d8 for damage. On a result of 3, use 2d8 for damage. On a result of 4, use 2d10 for damage. On a result of 5, use 3d10 for damage. On a result of 6, use 4d10 for damage. Magnitude can hit targets using the Move Dig.

Move.Name: Mud Bomb
Move.Effect: Mud Bomb creates a 1-meter Blast. All Legal Targets must roll +1 during Accuracy Checks for the remainder of the encounter on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Sand-Attack
Move.Effect: Sand-Attack creates a Column 1 meter wide. All Legal Targets must roll +1 during Accuracy Checks for the remainder of the encounter.

Move.Name: Spikes
Move.Effect: Set 10 square meters of Spikes, all 10 meters must be adjacent with at least one other space of Spikes next to each other. Spikes cause all foes to lose 1/8th of their full HP when joining the encounter or getting sent out. If there are 2 Layers of Spikes, the foes lose 1/6th of their full HP. If there are 3 Layers of Spikes, the foes lose 1/4th of their full HP.

Move.Name: Mud-Slap
Move.Effect: Mud-Slap creates a Column 1-meter wide. All Legal Targets must roll +2 during Accuracy Checks for the remainder of the encounter on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Sand Tomb
Move.Effect: Sand Tomb Traps the target for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d20 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Sand Tomb may not trap more then one target at a time.

Move.Name: Fissure
Move.Effect: Fissure creates a Column that is 3-meters wide. All Legal Targets have their HP set to 0. Fissure can hit targets using the Move Dig.

Move.Name: Bonemerang
Move.Effect: Bonemerang can hit up to 2 times. If Bonemerang misses its first target, you may still use it a second time.

Move.Name: Bulldoze
Move.Effect: Bulldoze creates a 3-meter Burst. All Legal Targets are lowered 1 Speed Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Bone Club
Move.Effect: Bone Club Flinches the target on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Bone Rush
Move.Effect: Bone Rush can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Bone Rush attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Earth Power
Move.Effect: Earth Power creates a 3-meter Blast. Earth Power lowers the Special Defense of all Legal Targets 1 Combat Stage on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Earthquake
Move.Effect: Earthquake creates a 5-meter Burst. Earthquake can hit targets using the Move Dig.

Move.Name: Dig
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Dig, the user is moved underground and their turn ends. On the next turn, Dig's user may shift, using their Overland or Burrow Speed then uses Dig's damage. While underground, Dig's user may not be the target of Moves.

Move.Name: Drill Run
Move.Effect: Drill Run is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ice Shard
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Ice Shard on their turn before they can use their Move.

Move.Name: Icicle Crash
Move.Effect: Icicle Crash Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ice Punch
Move.Effect: Ice Punch Freezes the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ice Burn
Move.Effect: Ice Burn creates a Column 2-meters wide. All Legal Targets are pushed 10-meters and take an additional 1d6 if Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. Ice Burn Burns all Legal Targets on 15-20 on Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Ice Fang
Move.Effect: Ice Fang Freezes or Flinches on 18-19 during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe gets Frozen or Flinches. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is Frozen and Flinches.

Move.Name: Powder Snow
Move.Effect: Powder Snow creates a 1-meter wide. Powder Snow Freezes all Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Sheer Cold
Move.Effect: Sheer Cold creates 3-meter Blast. All Legal Targets have their HP set to 0.

Move.Name: Mist
Move.Effect: The target with Mist's Coat may not have their Combat Stages lowered. Mist can Target Self.

Move.Name: Icicle Spear
Move.Effect: Icicle Spear can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Icicle Spear attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Icy Wind
Move.Effect: Icy Wind creates a Column 1-meter wide. All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Freeze Shock
Move.Effect: Freeze Shock creates a Column 2-meters wide. All Legal Targets are pushed 10-meters and take an additional 1d6 if Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. Freeze Shock paralyzes all Legal Targets on 15- 20 on Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Frost Breath
Move.Effect: Frost Breath is a Critical Hit.

Move.Name: Blizzard
Move.Effect: Blizzard creates a Column that is 3-meters wide. Blizzard Freezes all legal targets on 16-20 during accuracy Check. If it is Hailing, Blizzard cannot miss.

Move.Name: Aurora Beam
Move.Effect: Aurora Beam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Aurora Beam lowers the target's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Avalanche
Move.Effect: Avalanche creates a Column 2-meters wide. If a target damaged Avalanche's user on their last turn, deal an additional 2d10 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Ice Ball
Move.Effect: The user must use Ice Ball until it misses, or fails to be able to shift enough to hit a target for their next 4 turns. On the second turn, Ice Ball uses 1d8+4 for its Damage Dice Roll. On the third turn, Ice Ball uses 2d8+8. On the fourth turn, Ice Ball uses 3d10+10. On the fifth and final turn, Ice Ball uses 5d10+15.

Move.Name: Ice Beam
Move.Effect: Ice Beam creates a Column 1 meter wide. Ice Beam Freezes all Legal Targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Haze
Move.Effect: For 30 seconds, the area is considered Hazy. Hazy does not replace other Weather Statuses. In Hazy Weather, all Combat Stages get set to 0.

Move.Name: Glaciate
Move.Effect: Glaciate creates a 5-meter Burst. All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 1 Combat Stage. On a roll of 11-20 during Accuracy Check, all Legal Targets on the ground are Trapped and cannot shift for 2 rounds.

Move.Name: Hail
Move.Effect: For 2 minutes (12 rounds), the area is considered Hailing. At the beginning of each round, all non-Ice Type Pokemon lose 1/16th of their full HP. Ice Type Pokemon are treated as if their Defense is raised 2 Combat Stages while Hailing.

Move.Name: Safeguard
Move.Effect: Place 10-meters of Wall that can be passed through and attacked through. If the effect of a Move that targets through any Walls of Safeguard cause a Status Affliction, they cannot cause a Status Affliction. The Walls sustain for 5 rounds.

Move.Name: Round
Move.Effect: Round creates a 3-meter Burst. The next Pokemon who uses Round during this round of Combat uses 20+2d10 for Round's Damage Dice Roll. The third or any use after the third use of Round during this round of Combat uses 30+3d10 for Round's Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Scary Face
Move.Effect: The target's Speed is lowered 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Screech
Move.Effect: Screech creates a 4-meter Burst. All Legal Targets have their Defense lowered 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Retaliate
Move.Effect: Retaliate deals an additional 5d12 during Damage Dice Roll if an ally has been lowered to 0 HP or less by the target's Moves or Features during the last 2 rounds of combat.

Move.Name: Relic Song
Move.Effect: Relic Song creates a 4-meter Burst. All Legal Targets fall Asleep on 16-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Return
Move.Effect: The user may only use Return if its Loyalty is 3 or 4.

Move.Name: Rock Climb
Move.Effect: Rock Climb Confuses the target on 17- 20 during Accuracy Checks.

Move.Name: Roar
Move.Effect: The target flees away from the user 15 meters, ignoring Speed Capabilities, if terrain allows. The target may not use Moves for 4 rounds. During a trainer battle, the target's owner must recall the fleeing target and replace them.

Move.Name: Sketch
Move.Effect: Sketch cannot miss. Once Sketch has been used, remove Sketch from the user's Move list. The last Move that the target used is added to the user's Move list permanently. Sketch may not be Interrupted or Intercepted.

Move.Name: Sing
Move.Effect: Sing creates a 4-meter Burst. All Legal Targets fall Asleep.

Move.Name: Skull Bash
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Skull Bash, the user's turn ends. On its next turn, the user may shift and use Skull Bash's damage and effect. The target is Pushed 4-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Slack Off
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP.

Move.Name: Selfdestruct
Move.Effect: Selfdestruct creates a 4-meter Burst. The user's HP is set to -50% of their full HP. If the user is above Loyalty 1, their Loyalty is lowered at least 1 stage.

Move.Name: Secret Power
Move.Effect: Secret Power's effect depends on Environ. Secret Power's effect activates on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Sharpen
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Simple Beam
Move.Effect: Simple Beam changes one of the target's abilities to Simple for the remainder of the encounter.

Move.Name: Shell Smash
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 2 Combat Stages, raise the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages and raise the user's Speed 2 Combat Stages Lower the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage and lower the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Refresh
Move.Effect: The user is cured of all Status ailments.

Move.Name: Pain Split
Move.Effect: Add the user's and the targetâ€™s current HP together and divide the value by 2, calling the result X. The user and target's HP are set to X. If X exceeds a target's or userâ€™s full HP, the excess is ignored and they are set to full HP.

Move.Name: Odor Sleuth
Move.Effect: The user's Normal-Type and Fighting- Type Moves can now hit and affect Ghost-Type targets. Odor Sleuth's user is unaffected by the effects of Moves which make them have to roll higher during Accuracy Checks to hit. Targets may not use their Speed stat to modify Accuracy Checks. Odor Sleuth's user can identify the real target using Double Team.

Move.Name: Pay Day
Move.Effect: Pay Day scatters metal coins equal in value to 1d8 times the user's level. If it is a trainer battle, the winner of the battle gets to pick up the coins.

Move.Name: Perish Song
Move.Effect: Perish Song creates a 15-meter Burst. Perish Song cannot miss. Perish Song can affect only pokemon. All targets, including the user, receive a Perish Count of 3. At the beginning of each of the target's turns, their Perish count is lowered by 1. Once a Perish Count reaches 0, set the pokemon's HP to 0. A Perish Count disspears if a Pokemon returns to their Poke Ball or is knocked out.

Move.Name: Moonlight
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2/3 of its full HP. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming or Hailing the user gains 1/4 of their full HP.

Move.Name: Minimize
Move.Effect: Foes need an additional +4 during Accuracy Check to hit Minimize's user and the user's size is Small for the remainder of the encounter.

Move.Name: Morning Sun
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2/3 of its full HP. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming or Hailing the user gains 1/4 of their full HP.

Move.Name: Nature Power
Move.Effect: Nature Power uses a Move defined by Environ.

Move.Name: Natural Gift
Move.Effect: Refer to the Move Keywords Berry list. Natural Gift deals damage according to the Berry list and Natural Gift's Type is also defined there. The user's Berry is destroyed and is not consumed.

Move.Name: Razor Wind
Move.Effect: Once you declare the use of Razor Wind, the user's turn ends. On its next turn, the user may shift and use Razor Wind's damage. Razor Wind is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Rapid Spin
Move.Effect: On hit, Rapid Spin destroys Hazards within 5 meters, removes Leech Seeds, and removes the user's Trapped status.

Move.Name: Recover
Move.Effect: The user regains HP equal to half of its full HP.

Move.Name: Reflect Type
Move.Effect: Reflect Type changes one of the user's Types into one Type of your choice that the target has for 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Recycle
Move.Effect: The effect of a consumable item used earlier in the encounter is used again as if it had not been destroyed. The item is still gone.

Move.Name: Protect
Move.Effect: If the user is hit by a Move, instead you are not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects.

Move.Name: Present
Move.Effect: Roll 1d4. On a result of 1, use 1d10+10 for Present's Damage Dice Roll; on a result of 2, use 2d10+10; on a result of 3, use 3d10+10; on a result of 4 the target is healed 65 HP.

Move.Name: Psych Up
Move.Effect: The user's Combat Stages are changed to match the target's Combat Stages. Psych Up cannot miss.

Move.Name: Rage
Move.Effect: The user's Attack is raised 1 Combat Stage as long as they used Rage on their previous turn. If the user is damaged by an attack before it's next turn, its Attack is raised 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Quick Attack
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Quick Attack on their turn before they can use their Move.

Move.Name: Slash
Move.Effect: Slash is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Thrash
Move.Effect: Thrash's user must make another Melee attack for 1d2 more turns. The attack is identical to Thrash except for Thrash's effect. After the first target is declared, Thrash targets the nearest Legal Target for its second or third round of use if the original target is unconscious. If potential targets are an equal distance from the user, you may choose the target. After Thrash's additional use(s) end(s), the user becomes Confused. For Pokemon users, the additional 1d2 are their Trainer's Command Actions, unless the Trainer is unconscious, in which case the Pokemon acts on its own until finished.

Move.Name: Teeter Dance
Move.Effect: Teeter Dance creates a 7-meter Burst. Teeter Dance Confuses all Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Tickle
Move.Effect: Lower the target's Attack 1 Combat Stage and lower the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Tri Attack
Move.Effect: Tri Attack gives the target a Status ailment on 17-20 during Accuracy Check. If you rolled 17-20, roll 1d4; on 2 the target is Paralyzed; on 3 the target is Burned; on 4 the target is Frozen; on 1 reroll the die.

Move.Name: Transform
Move.Effect: The user assumes the form of the Pokemon-target and learns all of that specific target's Moves, gains its Abilitys, copies its weight and height and Capabilties for the remainder of the encounter, or until the user chooses to revert to its original form, or until the user uses Transform to change into something else. The user's Stats do not change. Transform cannot miss.

Move.Name: Tail Slap
Move.Effect: Tail Slap can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Tail Slap attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Tail Whip
Move.Effect: The target's Defense is lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Techno Blast
Move.Effect: Techno Blast's Type can be any Type while holding the appropriate Drive item or Plate item.

Move.Name: Take Down
Move.Effect: After Take Down deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Work Up
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Wish
Move.Effect: At the end of the target's next turn, the target regains HP equal to half of its full HP. If the user targets themselves and are replaced in battle, the replacement is healed.

Move.Name: Wrap
Move.Effect: Wrap Traps the target and the user for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d20 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Wrap may not trap more then one target at a time unless the user is Huge or Gigantic.

Move.Name: Yawn
Move.Effect: Yawn creates a 4-meter Burst. All targets fall Asleep at the end of their next turn. Yawn cannot miss.

Move.Name: Wring Out
Move.Effect: For every 10% the target is below their full HP, Wring Out's Damage Dice Roll is reduced by 1d12 to a minimum of 20.

Move.Name: Uproar
Move.Effect: Uproar creates a 5-meter Burst that continues for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the user's turn where Uproar is continuing, they may shift then must immediately use Uproar again. Anyone in Uproar's Burst on any turn Uproar is continuing is cured of Sleep.

Move.Name: Trump Card
Move.Effect: If the user has only used Trump Card once this encounter, use 1d10+10 for Trump Card's Damage Dice Roll. If it is the second time the user is using Trump Card, use 1d10+10. If it is the third time the user is using Trump Card, use 1d12+12. If it is the fourth time the user is using Trump Card, use 1d12+12. If it is the fifth time the user is using Trump Card, use 30+4d10 and Trump Card's Frequency changes to Center for the rest of the encounter.

Move.Name: Whirlwind
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 40-meters expelling them from the encounter if the terrain allows. They may still rejoin the encounter if they want to. During a trainer battle, the target's owner must recall the Pushed target and replace them.

Move.Name: Weather Ball
Move.Effect: If it is Sunny, Weather Ball is Fire-Type. If it is Rainy, Weather Ball is Water- Type. If it is Hailing, Weather Ball is Ice-Type. If it is Sandstorming, Weather Ball is Rock-Type. When a weather effect is on the field, Weather Ball's Damage Dice Roll is 4d12+17. If there are multiple Weather Effects on the field, choose one type for Weather Ball to be that corresponds with an existing Weather Effect.

Move.Name: Swords Dance
Move.Effect: The user's Attack is raised 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Spike Cannon
Move.Effect: Spike Cannon can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Spike Cannon attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Sonicboom
Move.Effect: Sonicboom creates a Column 1 meter wide. Sonicboom always deals 15 points of Damage. Do not apply weakness or resistance. Do not apply stats.

Move.Name: Spit Up
Move.Effect: If the user is Stockpiled 1, use 4d10+15 for Spit Up's Damage Dice Roll; if the user is Stockpiled 2, use 4d10+25; if the user is Stockpiled 3, use 5d10+35. After using Spit Up, the user's Stockpiled count is set to 0. If the user has no Stockpiled count, Spit Up does nothing.

Move.Name: Stockpile
Move.Effect: The user adds 1 to their Stockpiled count to a maximum of 3. For each number a Stockpiled count is above 0, raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage. If a Stockpiled count is set to 0, the Combat Stages gained from the Stockpiled count are removed.

Move.Name: SmellingSalt
Move.Effect: If the target is Paralyzed, Wake-Up Slap does an additional 5d10 for Damage Dice Roll and cures the target of Paralysis.

Move.Name: Sleep Talk
Move.Effect: The user randomly uses one of their other Moves, ignoring Frequencies. Sleep Talk can only be used while the user is Asleep.

Move.Name: Smokescreen
Move.Effect: Place 5-meters of Wall that can be passed through and attacked through. Smokescreen's Walls must be placed within 3-meters of the user. If anyone's Move tries to target through a Smokescreen wall, they must roll +3 during Accuracy Check to hit. The walls remain for 10 rounds. Brick Break cannot break Smokescreen's Walls.

Move.Name: Softboiled
Move.Effect: The target regains HP equal to half of its full HP. The user may target themselves with Softboiled.

Move.Name: Snore
Move.Effect: Snore creates a 5-meter Burst. Snore Flinches all legal targets on 15-20 during Accuracy Check. Snore can only be used by a Sleeping pokemon.

Move.Name: Swallow
Move.Effect: If the user is Stockpiled 1, they are healed 25% of their full HP; if the user is Stockpiled 2, they are healed half of their full HP; if the user is Stockpiled 3, they are healed back to full HP. After using Swallow, the user's Stockpiled count is set to 0. If the user has no Stockpiled count, Swallow does nothing.

Move.Name: Swagger
Move.Effect: The target's Attack is raised 2 Combat Stages. Swagger Confuses the target.

Move.Name: Sweet Kiss
Move.Effect: Sweet Kiss Confuses the target.

Move.Name: Swift
Move.Effect: Swift cannot Miss.

Move.Name: Sweet Scent
Move.Effect: Sweet Scent creates a 5-meter Burst. For the remainder of the encounter, when targeting any Legal Targets that were hit by Sweet Scent, you need -2 to hit that target during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Strength
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 8-meters.

Move.Name: Stomp
Move.Effect: Stomp Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check. If the target is Small, Stomp deals an additional 1d10.

Move.Name: Substitute
Move.Effect: The user loses 1/4 of their full HP. A Coat is made which has HP equal to the HP lost when using this Move +1. If the user would be hit by a Move, instead the Coat gets hit. Apply weakness, resistance and stats to the Coat. The Coat is immune to Status Afflictions. Substitute cannot be used if the user has less then 1/4 of their full HP.

Move.Name: Supersonic
Move.Effect: Supersonic creates a Column 1 meter wide. Supersonic Confuses all Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Super Fang
Move.Effect: The target's HP is halved. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. When halving the target's HP with Super Fang, round up.

Move.Name: Dizzy Punch
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 2-meters. Dizzy Punch Confuses the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Disable
Move.Effect: Name a Move. For the remainder of the encounter, the target may not use that Move; the Move is considered Disabled. A target may not have more then 1 Move Disabled, if a new move is Disabled, the last Disabled Move is no longer Disabled.

Move.Name: Double Hit
Move.Effect: Double Hit can hit up to 2 times. If Double Hit misses its first target, you may still use it a second time.

Move.Name: Double-Edge
Move.Effect: The target is pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. After Double-Edge deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Double Team
Move.Effect: The user makes three copies of themselves and places them into the encounter adjacent to the user. The user must place some sign under the token of the original copy to mark it as the original. If a copy is hit by a damaging Move, it is destroyed. If the original is hit by a damaging Move, all copies are destroyed. Any copy can perform a Move but the user is still only allowed one Move per turn. All copies may shift each turn. When the user and its copies are targeted by a Move, foes must roll +2 during Accuracy Check to hit for the remainder of the encounter. When a copy disappears, the user loses 1d6 HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to HP lost. Do not apply stats to HP lost.

Move.Name: Crush Claw
Move.Effect: Crush Claw lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 11-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Covet
Move.Effect: Covet takes the target's held item and attaches it to Covet's user, if the user is not holding anything.

Move.Name: Crush Grip
Move.Effect: For every 10% the target is below their full HP, Crush Grip's Damage Dice Roll is reduced by 1d12 to a minimum of 20.

Move.Name: Defense Curl
Move.Effect: Defense Curl raises the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage. If the user uses the Move Ice Ball or Rollout later in the encounter without having been switched out, each hit deals an additional 1d10 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Entrainment
Move.Effect: Entrainment changes one of the target's abilities into one Ability that the user has for 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Endure
Move.Effect: If the user is being hit by a damaging Move, you may use Endure. If the Move would bring Endure's user down to 0 HP or less, Endure's user instead is set to 1 HP.

Move.Name: Explosion
Move.Effect: Explosion creates a 7-meter Burst. The user's HP is set to -50% of their full HP. If the user is above Loyalty 1, their Loyalty is lowered at least 1 stage.

Move.Name: Facade
Move.Effect: If the user is afflicted with a Status effect, use an additional 4d12 during Damage Dice Roll. If the user is afflicted with a Status effect, Facade's Frequency drops (EOT to Battle or At-Will to EOT).

Move.Name: Extremespeed
Move.Effect: If a foe wants to declare a Move, you may instead use Extremespeed on their turn before they can use their Move. Extremespeed may not be Interrupted. After the user finishes the damage step of their turn, they may shift again.

Move.Name: Echoed Voice
Move.Effect: For every consecutive use of Echoed Voice, add 1d20 to its Damage Dice Roll to a maximum of 5d20. Consecutive uses of Echoed Voice can be used across different Pokemon. If Echoed Voice is not used at least once every turn, the consecutive uses of Echoed Voice reset.

Move.Name: Doubleslap
Move.Effect: Doubleslap can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Doubleslap attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Egg Bomb
Move.Effect: Egg Bomb creates a 2-meter Blast.

Move.Name: Endeavor
Move.Effect: The target's HP is set to equal the userâ€™s HP if the user's current HP is less then the target's current HP. If the userâ€™s HP is equal to or greater than the target's HP nothing happens.

Move.Name: Encore
Move.Effect: The target must use the same Move that it most recently used for the next 1d4+2 turns. If the Frequency of the move doesn't allow the Move to be used so often, the target instead cannot use a Move.

Move.Name: Copycat
Move.Effect: Use the Move the target has used on their last turn. You may choose new targets for the Move. Copycat cannot miss.

Move.Name: Belly Drum
Move.Effect: Belly Drum's user loses HP equal to half of its full HP. Do not appliy the user's stats to the HP lost. Belly Drum sets the user's Attack to +6 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Baton Pass
Move.Effect: The user is replaced with another pokemon from their trainer's roster. All Combat Stages and Coats on Baton Pass' user are transferred to the replacement. Baton Pass can ignore Traps, but the replacement is then Trapped.

Move.Name: Bestow
Move.Effect: The user gives its held item to the target, unless the target is already holding an item.

Move.Name: Bind
Move.Effect: Bind Traps the target and the user for 1d4+1 turns. At the beginning of the target's turn, if the target is Trapped, roll 1d20 and the target loses that much HP. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost. Do not apply stats to the HP lost. Bind may not trap more then one target at a time unless the User is Huge or Gigantic.

Move.Name: Bide
Move.Effect: You may use Bide as an Intercept upon being targeted by a Move. After declaring the use of Bide, the user ends their turn. At the start of their next turn, end their turn. On the turn after that, add up all of the damage the user has taken in the past 2 turns, call that total X. Bide's Target loses HP equal to twice the value of X. Do not apply weakness or resistance to the HP lost as a result of Bide. Do not apply stats to the HP lost as a result of Bide. Bide cannot miss.

Move.Name: After You
Move.Effect: The target goes first during the next round of combat, ignoring Speed stats. They may not be Interrupted by any Moves that round.

Move.Name: Acupressure
Move.Effect: Roll 1d6. On a result of 1, raise the target's Attack 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 2, raise the target's Defense 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 3, raise the target's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 4, raise the target's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 5, raise the target's Speed 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 6, the target needs -2 to hit during Accuracy Checks.

Move.Name: Assist
Move.Effect: Randomly select another pokemon on the user's roster and then randomly select a Move that Pokemon knows. Assist's user uses that Move immediatley.

Move.Name: Barrage
Move.Effect: Barrage can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Barrage attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Attract
Move.Effect: Attract Infatuates the target. Attract may not affect something that is the same gender as the user or something that is genderless.

Move.Name: Comet Punch
Move.Effect: Comet Punch can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Comet Punch attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Chip Away
Move.Effect: Ignore any changes in the target's Defense or Special Defense when calculating damage.

Move.Name: Constrict
Move.Effect: Constrict lowers the target's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Conversion2
Move.Effect: The user becomes the elemental Type of their choice as long as the Type resists the elemental Type of the Move it last took damage from until the end of the encounter. Replace all other Types.

Move.Name: Conversion
Move.Effect: The user becomes the elemental Type of their choice as long as they have a Move that is the same elemental Type until the end of the encounter. Replace all other Types.

Move.Name: Body Slam
Move.Effect: Body Slam Paralyzes the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Block
Move.Effect: Both the user and the target are Trapped.

Move.Name: Camouflage
Move.Effect: The user changes their Type to match the field. Forests and grassy areas change the user into Grass-Type. Watery areas change the user into Water-Type. Caves and Mountains could change the user into Rock-Type or Ground-Type. An icy terrain would turn the user into Ice- Type. A building may change the user into Steel-Type or Normal-Type. Weather affects what Type the user becomes. Use common sense, if you are having difficult determining what type the user should become, consult the GM.

Move.Name: Charm
Move.Effect: Charm lowers the target's Attack 2 Combat Stages.

Move.Name: Captivate
Move.Effect: Captivate lowers the target's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages. Captivate may not affect something that is the same gender as the user or something that is genderless.

Move.Name: Fake Out
Move.Effect: You may only use Fake Out at the beginning of an encounter, as an Interrupt. Fake Out Flinches the target.

Move.Name: Judgement
Move.Effect: Judgement makes a 5-meter Blast. Judgment's Type can be whatever Elemental Type the user wants it to be.

Move.Name: Hyper Voice
Move.Effect: Hyper Voice creates a Column 4-meters wide. All Legal Targets are Pushed back 3-meters.

Move.Name: Last Resort
Move.Effect: Last Resort can only be used after the user has performed 6 other different Moves.

Move.Name: Lock-On
Move.Effect: The target is Locked-On. On the user's next turn, if they target the Locked-On target, the Move they use cannot miss. Lock-On cannot miss.

Move.Name: Leer
Move.Effect: The target's Defense is lowered 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Horn Drill
Move.Effect: The target is set to 0 HP.

Move.Name: Howl
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat stage.

Move.Name: Hyper Fang
Move.Effect: Hyper Fang Flinches the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Hyper Beam
Move.Effect: Hyper Beam creates a Column 1 meter wide. On Miss, Hyper Beam deals the user's Special Attack instead to all possible targets.

Move.Name: Metronome
Move.Effect: Metronome randomly uses any other Move except for After You, Assist, Bestow, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Metronome, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Quash Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Snore, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Wide Guard. The GM helps to pick the random Move.

Move.Name: Milk Drink
Move.Effect: The target regains HP equal to half of its full HP. The user may target themselves with Milk Drink.

Move.Name: Mind Reader
Move.Effect: The target is Locked-On. On the user's next turn, if they target the Locked-On target, the Move they use cannot miss. Mind Reader cannot miss.

Move.Name: Mimic
Move.Effect: Choose a Move that the target has used during the encounter. For the remainder of the encounter, that Move replaces Mimic on the user's Move List. Mimic cannot miss.

Move.Name: Lucky Chant
Move.Effect: Lucky Chant creates a 4-meter Burst. All allies in the Burst, including the user, take damage from Critical Hits as if they are not Critical Hits for 1d4+1 turns.

Move.Name: Lovely Kiss
Move.Effect: The target falls Asleep.

Move.Name: Me First
Move.Effect: If the target declares a Move that has a Damage Dice Roll and Me First's user has a higher Speed stat then the target, you may Interrupt with Me First. Me First will use the same Move the target was about to use on that target.

Move.Name: Mega Kick
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed 6-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6.

Move.Name: Mean Look
Move.Effect: The target may not flee or be switched until it is knocked out, for the remainder of the encounter.

Move.Name: Hidden Power
Move.Effect: Hidden Power makes a 3-meter Burst. When a pokemon first obtains the Move Hidden Power, roll 1d4 and 1d20. For the 1d4 roll, a result of 1 makes Hidden Power's Damage Dice Roll 1d8+10; a result of 2 makes the Damage Dice Roll 1d10+12; a result of 3 makes the Damage Dice Roll 1d12+14; a result of 4 makes the Damage Dice Roll 2d12+16. For the 1d20 roll, Hidden Power's Elemental Type will be changed from Normal to Bug on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4; Fighting on 5; Fire on 6; Flying on 7; Ghost on 8; Grass on 9; Ground on 10; Ice on 11; Normal on 12; Poison on 13; Psychic on 14; Rock on 15; Steel on 16; Water on 17; and on a result of 18-20, reroll the d20. Those become the Hidden Power's permanent stats for that user.

Move.Name: Foresight
Move.Effect: The user's Normal-Type and Fighting- Type Moves can now hit and affect Ghost-Type targets. Foresight's user is unaffected by the effects of Moves which make them have to roll higher during Accuracy Checks to hit. Targets may not use their Speed stat to modify Accuracy Checks. Foresight's user can identify the real target using Double Team.

Move.Name: Follow Me
Move.Effect: All Foes may only target the user when using a Move until the user is knocked out or switched out. This Effect lasts for one round of combat.

Move.Name: Frustration
Move.Effect: The user may only use Frustration if its Loyalty is level 0 or 1.

Move.Name: Fury Swipes
Move.Effect: Fury Swipes can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Fury Swipes attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Fury Attack
Move.Effect: Fury Attack can hit up to 5 times. Once the user misses, they cannot attempt to make another Fury Attack attack on that turn. When adding stats only add 1/2 Attack.

Move.Name: Feint
Move.Effect: Feint may only Interrupt Intercepts. If used as an Interrupt, the target flips a coin, if they win the flip, they may retain the use of their Intercept for the encounter as if they did not use it during the encounter. If the target loses the flip, they use up their Intercept. Feint ignores all Intercept effects, dealing damage as if the Intercept was not used.

Move.Name: False Swipe
Move.Effect: If False Swipe would lower the target to 0 HP or less, the target is instead set to 1 HP unless the target was already below 0 HP.

Move.Name: Flail
Move.Effect: If the user has more than 70% of its total HP, use 1d10+5 for Damage Dice Roll. If the user has more than 36% of its total HP, use 2d10+10. If the user has more than 21% of its total HP, use 3d10+10. If the user has more than 6% of its total HP, use 4d10+10. If the user has 1-5% of its total HP, use 5d10+20

Move.Name: Focus Energy
Move.Effect: The user's Moves are Critical Hits on 17-20. If a Move already has an extended Critical Hit range, Focus energy extends that range by -3. Focus Energy's effect cannot be used more then once per encounter unless the user somehow loses the benefit of Focus Energy.

Move.Name: Flash
Move.Effect: Flash creates a 4-meter Burst. Flash makes all Legal Targets need +1 to hit during Accuracy Checks.

Move.Name: Headbutt
Move.Effect: Headbutt Flinches the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Harden
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Head Charge
Move.Effect: The target is Pushed back 5-meters. The target takes an additional 1d6 if it is Pushed into Blocking Terrain. If the target is pushed into another Legal Target, instead, both take 1d6. After Head Charge deals damage, Recoil.

Move.Name: Helping Hand
Move.Effect: The ally targeted with Helping Hand will have their next Move deal an additional 1d20 if the Move has a Damage Dice Roll. Helping Hand cannot miss.

Move.Name: Heal Bell
Move.Effect: Heal Bell creates a 3-meter Burst. All targets are cured of any Status ailments. Heal Bell cannot miss.

Move.Name: Glare
Move.Effect: Glare Paralyzes the target.

Move.Name: Giga Impact
Move.Effect: Giga Impact creates a 3-meter Burst around the target. On Miss, Giga Impact deals the user's Attack instead to all possible targets.

Move.Name: Growl
Move.Effect: Growl creates a 5-meter Burst. Growl lowers all Legal Targets Attack 1 Combat Stage.

Move.Name: Guillotine
Move.Effect: The target is set to 0 HP.

Move.Name: Growth
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage. If it is Sunny, double the amount of Combat Stages gained.

Move.Name: Sludge
Move.Effect: Sludge creates a Column 2-meters wide. Sludge poisons all Legal Targets on 15- 20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Sludge Bomb
Move.Effect: Sludge Bomb creates a 3-meter Blast. Sludge Bomb poisons all Legal Targets on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Poisonpowder
Move.Effect: Poisonpowder creates a 1-meter Blast. Poisonpowder Poisons all Legal Targets.

Move.Name: Poison Sting
Move.Effect: Poison Sting Poisons the target on 17-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Poison Tail
Move.Effect: Poison Tail is a Critical Hit on 18-20 during Accuracy Check. Poison Tail Poisons the target on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Toxic Spikes
Move.Effect: Set 10 square meters of Toxic Spikes, all 10 meters must be adjacent with at least one other space of Toxic Spikes next to each other. Toxic Spikes Poisons a foe when joining the encounter or getting sent out. If there are 2 Layers of Toxic Spikes, it Deadly Poisons the foes instead.

Move.Name: Venoshock
Move.Effect: If the target is Poisoned, Venoshock deals an additional 2d10 during Damage Dice Roll.

Move.Name: Toxic
Move.Effect: The target is Badly Poisoned.

Move.Name: Sludge Wave
Move.Effect: Sludge Wave makes a Column 4-meters wide. Slime Wave Poisons all legal targets on 19-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Smog
Move.Effect: Smog creates a 3-meter Blast. Smog Poisons all Legal Targets on 13-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Poison Jab
Move.Effect: Poison Jab Poisons the target on 15-20 during Accuracy Check.

Move.Name: Clear Smog
Move.Effect: The target's Combat Stages are reset to 0.

Move.Name: Coil
Move.Effect: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage. For the remainder of Combat, the user needs -1 on Accuracy Checks to hit.

Move.Name: Acid Spray
